mn76:4.3_0: Addasā kho sandako paribbājako āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.

mn76:4.8_0: Appasaddakāmā kho pana te āyasmanto appasaddavinītā appasaddassa vaṇṇavādino;

mn76:4.10_0: Atha kho te paribbājakā tuṇhī ahesuṁ.
mn76:5.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena sandako paribbājako tenupasaṅkami.
mn76:5.2_0: Atha kho sandako paribbājako āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
mn76:5.3_0: “etu kho bhavaṁ ānando, svāgataṁ bhoto ānandassa.
mn76:5.4_0: Cirassaṁ kho bhavaṁ ānando imaṁ pariyāyamakāsi yadidaṁ idhāgamanāya.
mn76:5.6_0: Nisīdi kho āyasmā ānando paññatte āsane.
mn76:5.7_0: Sandakopi kho paribbājako aññataraṁ nīcaṁ āsanaṁ gahetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
mn76:5.8_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho sandakaṁ paribbājakaṁ āyasmā ānando etadavoca:
mn76:5.9_0: “kāya nuttha, sandaka, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā, kā ca pana vo antarākathā vippakatā”ti?
mn76:5.10_0: “Tiṭṭhatesā, bho ānanda, kathā yāya mayaṁ etarahi kathāya sannisinnā.
mn76:5.11_0: Nesā bhoto ānandassa kathā dullabhā bhavissati pacchāpi savanāya.
mn76:5.12_0: Sādhu vata bhavantaṁyeva ānandaṁ paṭibhātu sake ācariyake dhammīkathā”ti.
mn76:5.13_0: “Tena hi, sandaka, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn76:5.14_0: “Evaṁ, bho”ti kho sandako paribbājako āyasmato ānandassa paccassosi.

mn76:24.2_0: So anussavena itihitihaparamparāya piṭakasampadāya dhammaṁ deseti.
mn76:24.3_1: satthuno anussavasaccassa sussutampi hoti dussutampi hoti tathāpi hoti aññathāpi hoti.
mn76:25.1_0: Tatra, sandaka, viññū puriso iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn76:25.2_0: ‘ayaṁ kho bhavaṁ satthā anussaviko anussavasacco so anussavena itihitihaparamparāya piṭakasampadāya dhammaṁ deseti.

mn76:25.5_0: iti viditvā tasmā brahmacariyā nibbijja pakkamati.

mn76:28.1_0: Tatra, sandaka, viññū puriso iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn76:28.3_0: So takkapariyāhataṁ vīmaṁsānucaritaṁ sayampaṭibhānaṁ dhammaṁ deseti.

mn76:50.1_0: Tassa evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati,

mn76:51.3_1: abhabbo khīṇāsavo bhikkhu adinnaṁ theyyasaṅkhātaṁ ādātuṁ,
mn76:51.3_2: abhabbo khīṇāsavo bhikkhu methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevetuṁ,

mn76:51.4_1: bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto,

mn76:52.1_3: sammadaññāvimutto tassa carato ceva tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṁ samitaṁ ñāṇadassanaṁ

mn76:52.6_0: tassa carato ceva tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṁ samitaṁ jānāti:
mn76:52.9_0: “Na kho, bho ānanda, so puriso satataṁ samitaṁ jānāti:
mn76:52.11_0: Api ca kho pana naṁ paccavekkhamāno jānāti:
mn76:52.13_1: yo so bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano
mn76:52.13_2: sammadaññāvimutto tassa carato ceva tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṁ samitaṁ ñāṇadassanaṁ
mn76:52.15_0: api ca kho pana naṁ paccavekkhamāno jānāti:
mn76:53.1_0: “Kīvabahukā pana, bho ānanda, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye niyyātāro”ti?
mn76:53.2_1: ekaṁyeva sataṁ na dve satāni na tīṇi satāni na cattāri satāni na pañca satāni,
mn76:53.2_2: atha kho bhiyyova ye imasmiṁ dhammavinaye niyyātāro”ti.
mn76:53.4_2: āyatane ca dhammadesanā tāva bahukā ca niyyātāro paññāyissanti.
mn76:53.5_0: Ime panājīvakā puttamatāya puttā attānañceva ukkaṁsenti,
mn76:53.5_1: pare ca vambhenti tayo ceva niyyātāro paññapenti,
mn76:53.6_0: nandaṁ vacchaṁ, kisaṁ saṅkiccaṁ, makkhaliṁ gosālan”ti.
mn76:54.1_0: Atha kho sandako paribbājako sakaṁ parisaṁ āmantesi:
mn76:54.3_0: Na dāni sukaraṁ amhehi lābhasakkārasiloke pariccajitun”ti.
mn76:54.4_0: Iti hidaṁ sandako paribbājako sakaṁ parisaṁ uyyojesi bhagavati brahmacariyeti.
